sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Migrate the Relation Type to default Finish-to-Start ( If empty)</description> <name>Add Relation Type to Project and Tasks</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[// Set the Relation Type to FS if the Relation Type is Empty var gr = new GlideRecord('planned_task_rel_planned_task'); gr.addQuery('type', '33a57d3d0a0a0b7b00819e4d4402fb14'); // Predecessor Successor Relations gr.addNullQuery('sub_type'); gr.query(); gs.log('Count of Empty Relation Records: ' + gr.getRowCount()); while(gr.next()) { gr.setValue('sub_type', 'fs'); gr.setWorkflow(false); gr.update(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-03-31 09:35:37</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c761d0039f033100598a5bb0657fcf12</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Add Relation Type to Project and Tasks</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Project Management" source="com.snc.project_management_v3">9eef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_c761d0039f033100598a5bb0657fcf12</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-04-08 12:47:03</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
